title: get in touch
message: You can check out more of my work and contact me through my social media accounts by clicking on any of the icons below. Alternatively, you can use the form below to send me your name, email, and a message describing what type of project you are interested in working on.

form.title: contact me
form.successMessage: Your message was successfully sent. Thank you for your interest, will be in contact shortly.
form.failMessage: Your message was successfully sent. Thank you for your interest, will be in contact shortly.
